contents.text: Welcome to Cloudflare in San Francisco, where we make your applications faster and safer.
For performance and reliability solutions, press 1.
To discuss CDN acceleration and caching services, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our CDN and caching team.

navigationGoals: Improve my site’s load times with CDN caching and acceleration.
I need to set up CDN caching to speed up my community website.
Optimize my CDN setup by configuring caching rules and purging stale content.
I’d like help setting up CDN caching to speed up my website.
I need to set up a CDN to speed up access to our research data and simulation results for collaborators.

contents.text: To set up DNS and load balancing, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our DNS and load balancing specialists.

navigationGoals: Set up DNS-based load balancing for my multi-region app.
I need assistance configuring DNS settings and load balancing for my organization’s domain.
Set up DNS load balancing with automated health checks across origins.
I need assistance configuring my domain’s DNS records and load balancing.
I want to configure DNS and load balancing for our physics simulation servers to ensure high availability.

contents.text: For security and networking services, press 2.
To learn about DDoS protection and web application firewall, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our DDoS and WAF support team.

navigationGoals: Enable DDoS protection and configure WAF rules for my site.
I want to configure DDoS protection and a web application firewall for my site.
Activate DDoS protection and fine-tune WAF policies to filter threats.
I want to enable DDoS protection and set up a web application firewall.
I need assistance enabling DDoS protection and a web application firewall for my public physics project site.

contents.text: For Zero Trust access and network security, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our Zero Trust and network security experts.

navigationGoals: Implement Zero Trust policies to secure remote access.
I need to implement Zero Trust network access for my remote team.
Deploy Zero Trust network policies for secure internal application access.
I need help implementing Zero Trust access policies for my network.
I'm looking to implement Zero Trust access controls to secure remote connections to our lab network.
